welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Standish, a charming town known for its historic streets and warm, friendly community. We hope you'll take time to explore and discover all the beauty and character this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo operations at Warton Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving mainly low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving mainly long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
